accountSettingsDesc: Manage language and other personal preferences.
appearanceDesc: Manage how your public dashboard looks and feels
notificationSettingsDesc: Manage email and in-product notification from site.
systemDesc: Manage general configuration, security, automation and more.
jobDesc: Manage job type, overview analysis and more.
paymentDesc: Manage income, staff cost, payment method, overview analysis and more.
teamDesc: Manage teams, access request and more.
articlesDesc: Manage, create new, edit articles and more.

fields.emailDesc: Your contact email address, used for notifications and account verification.
fields.fullnameDesc: Your full name as registered in the system, displayed in your profile and across the platform.
fields.usernameDesc: The account name you use to log in to the system.
fields.departmentDesc: The department you belong to within the company.
fields.jobTitleDesc: Your position or role within the company.
fields.phoneNumberDesc: Your contact phone number, used for calls or SMS notifications.
